original: 15.18. Hetuduka, Atītattika🔽Hetu atīto dhammo nahetussa naatītassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava …pe… vigate nava.
analyzed: hetuduka atītattika  hetu atītaḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na atītassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā nava anantare nava pe upanissaye nava pe vigate nava
translated: The Chapter on the Triad in Direct and Reverse Order🔽A past root-cause dhammas is related to a non-root-cause dhammas that is not past by way of object condition. There are nine in object condition, nine in decisive support condition, nine in non-obstruction condition, nine in presence condition, nine in non-disappearance condition.

original: Hetu anāgato dhammo nahetussa naanāgatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
analyzed: hetu anāgataḥ dhammaḥ na hetussa na anāgatassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā upanissaye nava
translated: A future root-cause dhammas is related to a non-root-cause dhammas that is not future by way of object condition. There are nine in object condition, nine in decisive support condition, nine in non-obstruction condition, nine in presence condition, nine in non-disappearance condition.
